entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 25 April 2023
